DataSourcePortable.Name: Valor já incluído na remessa
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT 
 CASE VALORTOTAL 
 WHEN NULL THEN 0 ELSE VALORTOTAL
 END VALORTOTAL,
 CASE HANDLE
 WHEN NULL THEN 0 ELSE HANDLE
 END HANDLE
FROM GN_HBREMESSAS
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="VALORTOTAL" From="A" Path="VALORTOTAL" /> <Field Alias="HANDLE" From="A" Path="HANDLE" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
